text: With authority looming, we'd best keep our heads low, men!
Take what you can get, give nothing back!
With the winds at our backs, and blades in our hands, freedom is ours to enjoy!
From the east to the west, all fame and treasure flows to our hands, to do with as we wish, lads!
Freedom and liberty for all! Throw off the oppression of the Han, and set sail with us!
[[b]]Youxia[[/b]] can be increased by winning offensive battles, sharing the spoils, and certain settlement actions.
[[b]]Youxia[[/b]] can be decreased by losing battles, raiding, and certain settlement actions.
Freedom and liberty for all! Throw off the oppression of the Han, and set sail with us!
• Increases via stances, battles, and settlement actions
• Decreases via raiding, losing battles, and settlement actions

Share out this army's gathered loot, providing large benefits to the local owned region.
Focus on plundering the local region, increasing the amount of loot gained per turn.
